name: To The Moon, 1995
description: This is one of my first works with layered composition in Photoshop 3.0 running on a Macintosh Quadra 950, dated 23 April 1995. It was entirely done with stock photos and used as a cover illustration (hence the empty spaces, reserved for text) for a special report by the newspaper "Folha de S. Paulo", called "The Information Era". This picture is a reasonable sampling of the most common personal devices of its time. It looks visually poor by today's standards, but was hard to make nonetheless.
